content: KWIK-Con+ Torx hex head SS screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (410 stainless steel, hex head with Torx®) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Torx® hex head with integrated washer for more secure driving and no bit slippage Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Other head configurations available in select sizes Matched-tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Applications Fastening on concrete, block, brick, and masonry Fitting window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, 410 Head configuration: Hex head Socket size: 0.31 in Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, 410 | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) | Material composition | Steel, SS 410 ### ITEMS- 2260062 - Screw Anchor Kwik-Con+ 1/4x1-1/4 THH SS410 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KC 1/4 x 1 1/4 THH SS Concrete screw - 3654661 - KWIK-CON+ 1/4 x 1 1/4 THH MC SS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x KC 1/4 x 1 1/4 THH SS Concrete screw - 2260108 - Screw Anchor Kwik-Con+ 1/4x2-3/4 THH SS410 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KC 1/4 x 2 3/4 THH SS Concrete screw - 3654662 - KWIK-CON+ 1/4 x 2 3/4 THH MC SS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x KC 1/4 x 2 3/4 THH SS Concrete screw
